sample.title: Diffie_Hellman_AES_Videochat
sample.description: This template shows an AES encrypted video chat which uses Diffie-Hellman to exchange an encryption key.
Diese Vorlage zeigt einen AES-verschlüsselten Video-Chat, der mittels Diffie-Hellman den Verschlüsselungsschlüssel austauscht.
sample.keywords: Diffie, Hellman, AES, Videochat, Camera, Network
